name: Mouse Jousting
description:
Stab red spiky things with your sword, protect your hilt.

Controls: Mouse to aim, click to lunge yourself.

The game has no win state, so don't waste your time trying to get to the end.

Hearts will spawn around the map, so make sure not to stay in one place too long!

Made in 3 hours for Friday Night Game Jam, this was a lot of fun, and I really like the 3 hour format, keeps me focused.
